resources.string: "- Better support of compressed XML files from APK archives - Support of binary PList files - Optimisation for faster use when browsing or openning a big file"
"- Bug corrected when saving a file - Support of compressed XML files from APK archives"
"- File encoding detection (UTF-8, UTF-16, UTF-32, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Hebrew, Greek) - Support of plist and svg files - Preview in browser for supported files (html, svg)"

"- Some people had issues when trying to read HTML documents. HTML being less strict than XML, this led to errors. This version will try to read the HTML anyway and convert it to well formed xHTML - This version also let you send me files that Axel can't open to let me improve this application - Some minor optimizations"
"- Fixed bug when saving templates - Modified notifications display"

"- Change node's children order - Added XML file templates for Schema, xHTML strict, sitemaps (contact me if you want more) - Added presets for Doctypes and Attributes - Added options to customize Axel's behavior"
"- Open, edit and save XML files - Validate input using W3C rules - Syntax coloration in the editor"
